IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO INSPIRE, STIMULATE AND ENTERTAIN DIVERSE AUDIENCES IN NORTHEAST OHIO BY PRODUCING PLAYS AND THEATRE EDUCATION PROGRAMS OF THE HIGHEST PROFESSIONAL STANDARDS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO INSPIRE, STIMULATE AND ENTERTAIN DIVERSE AUDIENCES IN NORTHEAST OHIO BY PRODUCING PLAYS AND THEATRE EDUCATION PROGRAMS OF THE HIGHEST PROFESSIONAL STANDARDS.
IRS990.Description: TO PRESENT PLAYS CELEBRATING THE HUMAN EXPERIENCE, TO PRESENT REPERTOIRE OF NEW PLAYS AND AMERICAN CLASSICS, TO FOCUS ON THE WORK OF THE PLAYWRIGHT, CREATE A WORLD-CLASS INSTITUTION SERVING PEOPLE OF LOCAL, NATIONAL, INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY AND TO EDUCATE THE COMMUNITY.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: PART XII, LINE 2D: THE AMOUNT OF $81,241 INCLUDES SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES NETTED OUT OF REVENUE. PART XIII, LINE 2D: THE AMOUNT OF $81,241 INCLUDES SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES NETTED OUT OF REVENUE.

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: BETSY'S COMPANY, YOUR CFO RESOURCE, PROVIDED FINANCIAL CONSULTING SERVICES TO THE VISION 100 PROJECT.

DispositionTable.DescriptionOfAsset: sale of building at 8500 euclid avenue, cleveland, oh 44106

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FOLLOWING BOARD MEMBERS HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP: WALTER KALBERER AND JEAN KALBERER CHLOE OLDENBURG AND BETH RANKIN

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY A SUBCOMMITTEE CONSISTING OF Certain members OF THE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE, FINANCE COMMITTEE AND MANAGEMENT REPRESENTATIVES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS DISCUSSED WITH AND PROVIDED IN WRITING TO ALL NEW DIRECTORS. WHEN REQUIRING PAID SERVICES, CHOICE OF VENDOR IS REVIEWED FOR POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST. A BOARD-REVIEWED BIDDING PROCESS IS USED FOR THE PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTANTIAL SERVICES. BOARD MEMBERS AFFILIATED WITH POTENTIAL VENDORS ARE NOT ALLOWED TO VOTE ON THESE CONTRACTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: OFFICERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE UNPAID. SALARIED EXECUTIVE (THE ARTISTIC DIRECTOR AND MANAGING DIRECTOR) COMPENSATION IS NEGOTIATED BY THE BOARD CHAIR WITH THE AUTHORITY OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, WITHIN A RANGE SET BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BASED ON PUBLISHED INDUSTRY PAY STANDARDS FOR COMPARABLE THEATRES. OTHER MANAGERS' COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE ARTISTIC AND MANAGING DIRECTORS BASED ON EXPERIENCE AND PUBLISHED INDUSTRY PAY STANDARDS FOR COMPARABLE POSITIONS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. THE 990 IS POSTED ON GUIDESTAR AND THE FOUNDATION CENTER WEBSITE FOR PUBLIC REVIEW.
THE PROCESS USED BY THE COMMITTEE THAT ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
